properties.entry: SELECT A.HP_CMT_NO , A.HP_CMT_CONTENT , A.HP_CMT_MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_REF_BOARD_NO , A.HP_PARENT_CMT_NO , A.HP_WRITE_TIME FROM (SELECT B.HP_CMT_NO , B.HP_CMT_CONTENT , B.HP_CMT_MEM_NO , C.MEM_NAME , B.HP_REF_BOARD_NO , B.HP_PARENT_CMT_NO , B.HP_WRITE_TIME FROM HOSPITAL_CMT B JOIN MEM_INFO C ON(B.HP_CMT_MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO) ORDER BY B.HP_CMT_NO DESC ) A WHERE A.HP_REF_BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO HOSPITAL_CMT ( HP_CMT_NO , HP_CMT_CONTENT , HP_CMT_MEM_NO , HP_REF_BOARD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_HT_CMT_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO HOSPITAL_CMT ( HP_CMT_NO , HP_CMT_CONTENT , HP_CMT_MEM_NO , HP_REF_BOARD_NO , HP_PARENT_CMT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_HT_CMT_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT A.HP_CMT_NO , A.HP_CMT_CONTENT , A.HP_CMT_MEM_NO , B.MEM_NAME , A.HP_REF_BOARD_NO , A.HP_PARENT_CMT_NO , A.HP_WRITE_TIME FROM HOSPITAL_CMT A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.HP_CMT_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HP_CMT_NO = ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_BD A SET A.HP_BD_CMT_COUNT = (SELECT B.HP_BD_CMT_COUNT + 1 FROM HOSPITAL_BD B WHERE HP_BD_NO = ? AND HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = ? ) WHERE HP_BD_NO = ? AND HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_QNA A SET A.HP_QNA_CMT_COUNT = (SELECT B.HP_QNA_CMT_COUNT + 1 FROM HOSPITAL_QNA B WHERE HP_QNA_NO = ? AND HP_QNA_CATEGORY_NO = ? ) WHERE HP_QNA_NO = ? AND HP_QNA_CATEGORY_NO = ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_RV A SET A.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT = (SELECT B.HP_RV_CMT_COUNT + 1 FROM HOSPITAL_RV B WHERE HP_RV_NO = ? AND HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = ? ) WHERE HP_RV_NO = ? AND HP_RV_CATEGORY_NO = ?
